description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034)'s plainpwd tool is a modified version of [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) and dumps Windows credentials from system memory.(Citation: ESET Telebots Dec 2016)(Citation: ESET Telebots June 2017)

external_references.description: Cherepanov, A.. (2016, December 13). The rise of TeleBots: Analyzing disruptive KillDisk attacks. Retrieved June 10, 2020.
Cherepanov, A.. (2017, June 30). TeleBots are back: Supply chain attacks against Ukraine. Retrieved June 11, 2020.
